sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BreakpointObserver, Breakpoints } from '@angular/cdk/layout'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { map, shareReplay } from 'rxjs/operators'; @Component({ standalone : true, selector: 'app-layout', templateUrl: './layout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./layout.component.scss'] }) export class LayoutComponent { isHandset$: Observable = this.breakpointObserver.observe(Breakpoints.Handset) .pipe( map(result => result.matches), shareReplay() ); constructor(private breakpointObserver: BreakpointObserver) {} } Menu Link 1 Link 2 Link 3 PwcExam
